segments.text: Don't talk too much , Tom . We are on duty today , we should hurry up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tom , your task is to clean the blackboard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to sweep the floor first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Daniel , I am not tall enough to reach the of the blackboard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Stand on the chair , Pig Tom . Use your brain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I've finished cleaning the blackboard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I forgot about it . I'll get it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Be quick , please . Our teacher and classmates will come soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will be done before they come .
segments.speaker: S2
